name: Artista - Puro Ambar - Corona
additionalNotes: Hardened resin millions of years old is pulled from the soil and a master craftsman meticulously works the stone-hard material to reveal its unique, golden beauty. The result is Ámbar Dominicano or Pure Dominican Amber, an exquisite and rare gemstone. This is the inspiration for Puro Ambar a cigar made entirely with long-aged tobacco grown in Dominican soil and handcrafted to express its full potential. Comes with notes of nutmeg, dried summer fruit, and sweet hay. With Dominican Habano wrapper, binder and filler.
